feature.adjustIngredientsDesc: Instantly adjust servings, swap in allergy-friendly substitutes, and effortlessly convert measurements. Personalize any dish to make it perfectly yours.
feature.bookmarkDesc: Forget cluttered notes and endless bookmarks. Store all your go-to recipes right on your phone with Souschef. It’s your culinary collection, curated.
feature.convertYoutubeDesc: Transform any YouTube cooking video into a streamlined, interactive recipe with ingredient lists, step-by-step instructions with timestamps, smart timers, and more.
feature.discoverDesc: Got a craving? Feed your raw thoughts into Souschef’s AI. Our new feature sifts through a myriad of recipes to find the perfect one for your next meal adventure.
feature.importRecipeDesc: Import recipes from blogs or YouTube without the ads or pop-ups. Keep your screen awake, and whip up timers in a tap. It’s the cooking app that just gets it.
feature.shoppingListDesc: Turn any recipes into smart grocery lists in seconds, sorted by aisle or recipe, and share with anyone!

header: Souschef: Cooking App That Makes Sense
welcomeNewFeatureIdea: Have ideas for new features? We’d love to hear them! Drop us a line at team@nekonote.co.
